CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1957 reads: "Congratulations! - District Attorney Edward C. Boyle (right) welcomes a new member to his staff of assistant prosecutors, Atty. Leroy K. Irvis (left) after he was sworn in by Prothonotary David B. Roberts on June 10. Attorney Irvis moves into the new post after serving as law clerk to Judges Loran Lewis and Anne X. Alpern. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: K. Leroy Irvis taking oath from District Attorney Edward C. Boyle for promotion to Assistant District Attorney, in interior with "Pledge of Allegiance" plaque
